verses.verse: Take heed <WG4337> that ye do <WG4160> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> alms <WG1654> before <WG1715> men <WG444> , to be seen <WG4314> <WG2300> of them <WG846> : otherwise <WG1490> ye have <WG2192> no <WG3756> reward <WG3408> of <WG3844> your <WG5216> Father <WG3962> which <WG3588> is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> .

The light <WG3088> of the body <WG4983> is <WG2076> the eye <WG3788> : if <WG1437> therefore <WG3767> thine <WG4675> eye <WG3788> be <WG5600> single <WG573> , thy <WG4675> whole <WG3650> body <WG4983> shall be <WG2071> full of light <WG5460> .

¶ No man <WG3762> can <WG1410> serve <WG1398> two <WG1417> masters <WG2962> : for <WG1063> either <WG2228> he will hate <WG3404> the one <WG1520> , and <WG2532> love <WG25> the other <WG2087> ; or else <WG2228> he will hold <WG472> to the one <WG1520> , and <WG2532> despise <WG2706> the other <WG2087> .
